game.name: Arcade Basketball
game.description:
All basketball lovers get ready to try their hands in a free online sports game where they can have the pleasure of enjoying their favorite sport in a realistic environment. You will surely forget all the basketball games you have tried before when you play Arcade Basketball online. The playground is full of audiences who will keep cheering your good efforts. Put your fingers on your mouse and be prepared to get as many balls as you can into the hoops! It is all about your basketball and time skill into test to clear levels. 

In this free online basketball game, you will be given 6 balls to play with. Target your aim at a perfect angle to go through your ball into the hoop! Remember you will have a specific target to complete in each level of this time-based game. Try to achieve your target in 45 seconds to clear your present level and move to the next one! Once the time is finished, a box will be displayed mentioning the details about your best scoring, stage, total shots, field goal, clean shots and field goal %. 

You will, of course, be rewarded with some good points if you complete your stage timely. Try not to be worried if you fail in your few initial attempts in this cool html5 ball puzzle game! Playing it for several times will help you to learn the tricks and tips on how to play basketball game online in your gaming device â€“ be it a desktop/laptop computer, mobile phone or tablet. Our popular game portal ensures you to meet countless top basketball games for free. Good luck to enjoy best sports games online without download app!!
